headline.main: Colombia Peace Deal Is Defeated, Leaving a Nation in Shock
headline.print_headline: Colombia Vote Overturns Deal to End Its War

docs.snippet: Voters narrowly rejected an agreement, signed just days before by the president and rebel leaders, that would have ended the country’s 52-year civil war....

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

byline.contributor: Julia Symmes Cobb reported from Bogotá, and Nicholas Casey from New York.
byline.original: By JULIA SYMMES COBB and NICHOLAS CASEY

docs.lead_paragraph: Voters narrowly rejected an agreement, signed just days before by the president and rebel leaders, that would have ended the country’s 52-year civil war.

headline.main: Pope Draws Line Between Trans Ministry and 'Indoctrination'
headline.print_headline: Pope Draws Line Between Trans Ministry and 'Indoctrination'

headline.main: A Look at What Colombia Referendum Result May Mean
headline.print_headline: A Look at What Colombia Referendum Result May Mean

docs.snippet: The national referendum in Colombia voted down the government's peace deal with leftist rebels less than a week after President Juan Manuel Santos signed the historic accord before an audience that included several heads of state and the United Na...
docs.lead_paragraph: The national referendum in Colombia voted down the government's peace deal with leftist rebels less than a week after President Juan Manuel Santos signed the historic accord before an audience that included several heads of state and the United Nations secretary-general. Here's a look at the results and what lies ahead:

headline.main: LeMahieu, Altuve Win Batting Titles; Trumbo Tops in Homers
headline.print_headline: LeMahieu, Altuve Win Batting Titles; Trumbo Tops in Homers

docs.snippet: Colorado's DJ LeMahieu won his first National League batting title Sunday, sitting out his second straight game to protect his lead over Washington's Daniel Murphy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colorado's DJ LeMahieu won his first National League batting title Sunday, sitting out his second straight game to protect his lead over Washington's Daniel Murphy.

headline.main: Bundy Brothers, Who Sought to Rally a Nation, Draw Scant Support at Trial
headline.print_headline: Bundys’ Call for Revolt Is But a Whisper at Trial

docs.snippet: After Ammon and Ryan Bundy staged an armed takeover of an Oregon wildlife sanctuary in January, their call to shift federal land to local control has softened to a whisper....
docs.lead_paragraph: After Ammon and Ryan Bundy staged an armed takeover of an Oregon wildlife sanctuary in January, their call to shift federal land to local control has softened to a whisper.

docs.snippet: The Hungarian prime minster, Viktor Orban, celebrated the referendum's outcome Sunday, which showed overwhelming support for his hard line on immigration, though too few voters turned out for the results to be legally valid....

byline.original: By REUTERS and THE ASSOCIATED PRESS

docs.lead_paragraph: The Hungarian prime minster, Viktor Orban, celebrated the referendum's outcome Sunday, which showed overwhelming support for his hard line on immigration, though too few voters turned out for the results to be legally valid.

headline.main: UK's Hammond Says Britain Needs New Economic Plan After Brexit Vote
headline.print_headline: UK's Hammond Says Britain Needs New Economic Plan After Brexit Vote

docs.snippet: Britain needs a new plan to balance the competing demands of fixing its still-weak public finances and boosting the economy with infrastructure spending following the vote to leave the European Union, finance minister Philip Hammond is expected to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain needs a new plan to balance the competing demands of fixing its still-weak public finances and boosting the economy with infrastructure spending following the vote to leave the European Union, finance minister Philip Hammond is expected to say on Monday.

headline.main: Madelene Sagstrom Wins 3rd Symetra Tour Title
headline.print_headline: Madelene Sagstrom Wins 3rd Symetra Tour Title

docs.snippet: Madelene Sagstrom won the Murphy USA El Dorado Shootout on Sunday for her third Symetra Tour title of the season, officially earning an LPGA Tour that she wrapped up months ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Madelene Sagstrom won the Murphy USA El Dorado Shootout on Sunday for her third Symetra Tour title of the season, officially earning an LPGA Tour that she wrapped up months ago.
